Topic.Title: BOZO and his gang is dumping shares..

Message.Msg: I corrected his math this past weekend when I was comparing 2010-2012 performance of AAPL and Scamazon. Bruce, I don't like seeing people get hurt. Cramer just led more to slaughter today with his technician's view of Amazon. Amazon is fighting economic forces much larger than itself. It's business model was optimized for the global economic situation of a decade ago, not today. Longs are actually living in the past and setup for an epic downfall. They can only run the scam for so long, especially because there is material tail risk here that could force Amazon to raise more capital in 2013. Be careful.
